issue.title: [C++] Add super-scalar impl for BitUtil::SetBitTo
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13473](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13473). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```java

void SetBitTo(uint8_t* bits, int64_t i, bool bit_is_set)
```
Add the super-scalar variant to set a bit, as described in here.

<https://graphics.stanford.edu/~seander/bithacks.html#ConditionalSetOrClearBitsWithoutBranching>

Add the implementation and run benchmarks (or create one if not exists)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13473?focusedCommentId=17396289) by Niranda Perera (niranda):*
This issue is abandoned, because there wasn't any substantial perf improvement.
